text: (He paigambara!) Tai pani yadi yi manisaharu tapa'isamga vadavivada gardachan bhane bhanidinus ma ra mera anuyayiharule sampurna rupama allahama samarpita bha'isakeka chaum ra kitabavala ra anapadhaharusita bhanidinus ki ke timiharule pani islama mandachau? Yadi yiniharu pani anuyayi bandachan bhane nihsandeha margadarsana prapta garnechan, ra yadi mandainan bhane tapa'iko kama matra allahako sandesa purya'idine ho. Allaha (aphna) bhaktaharula'i ramri dekhirakheko cha
